title: Calories in PBR Beer
meta_description: Discover calories in PBR (Pabst Blue Ribbon) beer per 12 oz serving, plus carbs, alcohol content, and nutrition tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can or bottle of Pabst Blue Ribbon lager; unopened, chilled; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and brand specifics; alcohol content affects calorie count. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz PBR beer contains ~145 kcal, mostly from alcohol and carbs.
